title: "Agribusiness and Trade: Robots putting Alliance Group at cutting edge"
excerpt: "Alliance Group installed robot cutters at the co-operative's 60-year-old Southland processing plant at Lorneville. The $12.5 million upgrade included new generation primal cutters, middles and fores technology together with an X-ray unit it uses to analyse each carcase,"
